description: Fine-tune your HTTP monitor's execution with custom settings. These settings will override the default values. For more information, visit [Advanced settings for HTTP monitors](https://dt-url.net/wa034cl).

constraints.customMessage: Connect timeout should be between 1 000 and 60 000 ms.

connectTimeout.description: Supported values are between 1 000 and 60 000 ms

constraints.customMessage: DNS query should be between 1 000 and 60 000 ms.

dnsQueryTimeout.description: Supported values are between 1 000 and 60 000 ms

constraints.customMessage: Maximum custom script size should be between 10 240 and 102 400 bytes.

maxCustomScriptSize.description: Supported values are between 10 240 and 102 400 bytes

constraints.customMessage: Maximum header size should be between 10 240 and 61 440 bytes.

maxHeaderSize.description: Supported values are between 10 240 and 61 440 bytes

constraints.customMessage: Maximum request body size should be between 10 240 and 102 400 bytes.

maxRequestBodySize.description: Supported values are between 10 240 and 102 400 bytes

constraints.customMessage: Maximum size of response body read by custom script should be between 10 240 and 102 400 bytes.

maxResponseBodyReadByScriptSize.description: Supported values are between 10 240 and 102 400 bytes
maxResponseBodyReadByScriptSize.displayName: Maximum size of response body read by custom script (B)

constraints.customMessage: Maximum response body size should be between 51 200 and 20 971 520 bytes.

maxResponseBodySize.description: Supported values are between 51 200 and 20 971 520 bytes

constraints.customMessage: Monitor execution timeout should be between 10 000 and 300 000 ms.

monitorExecutionTimeout.description: Supported values are between 10 000 and 300 000 ms

constraints.customMessage: Request timeout should be between 1 000 and 60 000 ms.

requestTimeout.description: Supported values are between 1 000 and 60 000 ms

constraints.customMessage: Script execution should be between 1 000 and 10 000 ms.

scriptExecutionTimeout.description: Supported values are between 1 000 and 10 000 ms
